about_the_game:
Black Paradox Reloaded takes the fast-paced, roguelite shoot 'em up to new heights. The pixel art has been completely overhauled, making every detail pop with vibrant color and clarity. The gameplay has been meticulously rebalanced, and the new synthwave tracks are electrifying, setting the perfect mood as you blast through waves of enemies. One of the standout additions is the hardcore boss rush mode – a true test for any seasoned player.
As the legendary bounty hunter Black Paradox, players will take on the Hellraisers, the galaxy's most notorious criminal syndicate, along with their seven formidable lieutenants.

Key Features

  • Upgraded Visuals: Stunning new pixel art enhances every aspect of the game.
  • Rebalanced Gameplay: Fine-tuned for a smoother, more challenging experience.
  • New Synthwave Tracks: Thrilling music that perfectly complements the intense action.
  • Hardcore Boss Rush Mode: An extra challenge for those seeking to push their skills.
  • Extensive Arsenal: 20 unique weapons, 37 powerups, 13 deadly drones, and 8 powerful combos, including the iconic "Black Paradox" move.
  • Diverse Enemies and Bosses: 62 different enemies with unique attack patterns and 14 deadly bosses, plus a secret one.
  • Stat Upgrades: Enhance your stats and unlock new powers to become even more formidable.
  • Local Co-op Mode: Team up with a friend for double the action and fun.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380

  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
